price: Wewe huna lako jambo katika haya - ama atawahurumia au atawaadhibu, kwani wao ni madhaalimu.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: Huna lako katika ninayo wafanyia waja wangu, kwani mambo yote ni ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Ama atawasamehe kwa Imani, au atawaadhibu kwa kuuwawa na hizaya na mateso ya Siku ya Kiyama, kwani hao ni madhaalimu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laysa laka mina al-amri shayon aw yatūba ʿalayhim aw yuʿadhibahum fa-innahum ẓālimūna
